title: Mobile Learning Architecture Design: Simulation Practice Based on Pervasive LMS

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Course providing experience in constructing mobile architecture in real learning environments through VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the roles of pervasive LMS components and implement them in a simulation environment.
Learners can design real-time learning scenarios using mobile devices and perform testing procedures.
Learners can visualize and analyze the data flow model of a distributed m-learning architecture in a VR environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
